name: WEALTHY PERSON SHOPPING SPREE
description:
PHILOMELA MIRROR http://philome.la/apologyfactory/shopping-spree !!

Click here to play ^^^

Imagine what luxuries you could buy if you were wealthy! Imagine the horrors! I did, and I put them in a game!

(money mention, weapon mention, bone mention)

Game made for Porpentine's Twinyjam, a 300-word twine and my first game! Made in 24 hours.
